agents.name: coinbase_agent
agents.role: Coinbase Agent -- Manages user's Coinbase account

agents.name: kraken_agent
agents.role: Kraken Agent -- Manages user's Kraken account

agents.name: binance_agent
agents.role: Binance Agent -- Manages user's Binance account

agents.name: airbnb_agent
agents.role: Airbnb Agent

agents.name: weather_agent
agents.role: Weather Agent

agents.name: calendar_agent
agents.role: Calendar Agent

agents.name: software_inc_hr_agent
agents.role: Software Inc HR Agent. This is the user's employer. Employee-facing agent that connects employee's personal agents to HR agent. Can share information on worker benefits, salary (W2), and other HR-related information. Asks for authentication from the employee before sharing information.

agents.name: email_agent
agents.role: Email Agent. Manages user's email. Has a both symbolic and semantic index of the user's email. Can read and write emails.

agents.name: vangard_agent
agents.role: Vangard Agent -- Manages user's Vanguard account

agents.name: robinhood_agent
agents.role: Robinhood Agent -- Manages user's Robinhood account

agents.name: fidelity_agent
agents.role: Fidelity Agent -- Manages user's Fidelity account

agents.name: schwab_agent
agents.role: Schwab Agent -- Manages user's Schwab account

agents.name: td_ameritrade_agent
agents.role: TD Ameritrade Agent -- Manages user's TD Ameritrade account

agents.name: crypto_agent
agents.role: Crypto Agent -- Manages user's crypto ecosystem, including crypto trading and staking as well custodial and non-custodial wallets

agents.name: filesystem_agent
agents.role: Filesystem Agent -- Manages user's filesystem, including files, folders, crypto wallets, and metadata. Has a both symbolic and semantic index of the user's filesystem.

agents.name: mortgage_agent
agents.role: Mortgage Agent -- Manages user's mortgage

agents.name: finance_and_accounting_agent
agents.role: Finance and Accounting Agent -- Manages user's financial and accounting information. Connects to brokerage, crypto, investment, and bank accounts.

agents.name: wells_fargo_agent
agents.role: Wells Fargo Agent -- Manages user's Wells Fargo account. Checking + Savings + Credit Card + Mortgage.

agents.name: turbotax_agent
agents.role: TurboTax Agent -- Manages user's TurboTax information and access the TurboTax API. The user pays for this AI TurboTax service. If given all of the information, the agent can file the user's taxes and has access to last year's tax return.

agents.name: client_agent
agents.role: The top-level client agent that communicates with the user and orchestrates the agents to complete the task.

location.description: The location to get Airbnb listings for
